Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Audio
    A class controlling the audio in the game.
    Canvas
    A class representing the canvas on the board on which tokens (players and weapons) are drawn.
    Frame
    A class that holds the main Swing elements of the game of Cluedo.
    HandBox
    A class that shows the player their hand.
    HandCanvas
    A class representing a canvas on which the player's hand will be drawn.
    MenuBar
    A class representing the JMenuBar that is displayed at the top of the program.
    MessageDialog
    A class that displays a message to the player.
    Mouse
    A class that handles mouse events.
